attributes.action: Absentee MP's must be made to quit parliament
attributes.additional_details: It is travesty that taxpayers, foot an inactive MP's salary, with zero accountability, for an inactive MP
attributes.background: There should be a law preventing MP's to serve parliament if they are inactive in parliament.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641224
